Name: Body Bar: Purifying (Neem & Turmeric)
Product_desc: Himalaya Botanique Purifying Neem & Turmeric Body Bar is a handcrafted combination of pure herbs and saponified essential oils that gently cleanse and moisturize. History’s original cleansing and detox plant, Neem, cleans and purifies your skin, while comforting turmeric reawakens tired skin leaving it invigorated and healthy-looking. This Neem & Turmeric bar is ideal for a relaxing evening bath or a warm, awakening shower.
Suggested_Use: Work into a rich, moisturizing lather. Rinse thoroughly.

Name: Body Bar: Refreshing (Lavender & Rosemary)
Product_desc: Calm your senses and rejuvenate your spirit with Himalaya Botanique's Lavender & Rosemary Body Bar. Rosemary awakens the senses and Lavendar leaves your skin feeling relaxed and clean. Gentle oils from Coconut and Cacao Butter hydrate and nourish your skin. Unlike common soaps, our bars use plant-based ingredients and saponified emollient oils to gently cleanse and moisturize.
Suggested_Use: Work into a rich, moisturizing lather. Rinse thoroughly.

Name: Chest Balm P.M.
Product_desc: Need something warm to relax and comfort you? Himalaya Chest Balm PM surrounds you with the welcoming respite of Turmeric and Holy Basil, while Eucalyptus vapors softly soothe you. Light and gentle oils leave soothing and moisturizing properties behind.
Suggested_Use: Apply under the nose, to the forehead and to the chest as needed.

Name: Face Scrub: Exfoliating (Walnut & Wood Apple)
Product_desc: After exfoliating, does your face feel dry? Unlike common face scrubs, Himalaya Walnut & Wood Apple Face Scrub deep cleans with moisture for pure, smooth & healthy-looking skin, with no dry feeling after you’re done. English Walnut invigorates and exfoliates, while Wood Apple cleans pores and removes impurities. Plant-based ingredients balance the skin with soothing scents and comforting cleanliness.
Suggested_Use: Moisten face and massage all over, avoiding the delicate eye area. Rinse and pat dry. Not recommended for acne-prone skin.

Name: Face Wash: Balancing (Neem & Turmeric)
Product_desc: Himalaya Botanique Neem and Turmeric Face Wash brings balance back to your daily cleansing, with gentle, deep-cleaning ingredients. Neem cleans oily skin and helps reduce occasional acne. Turmeric supports clear, healthy-looking skin. Extracts from Vitamin E and Coconut Oil leave your skin feeling soft and moisturized.
Suggested_Use: Moisten face and massage all over, avoiding the delicate eye area. Rinse and pat dry.

Name: Face Wash: Hydrating
Product_desc: Why put up with overly-drying soaps and cleansers? Treat your skin to radiant, luxurious and lather-rich Himalaya Botanique Hydrating Face Wash. Aloe Vera helps bring out your skin’s natural moisture, Lavender Oil adds calming warmth to the skin and supports suppleness, and a touch of Honey nourishes and moisturizes your face, leaving your skin feeling hydrated, not dry, after you wash.
Suggested_Use: Moisten face and massage all over, avoiding the delicate eye area. Rinse and pat dry.

Name: Face Wash: Invigorating
Product_desc: Give your skin a healthy-looking glow every day with Himalaya Botanique Invigorating Face Wash. Extracts of Cinnamon Bark awaken and invigorate your face for a fresh feeling, Lemon Peel uplifts tired dull skin, and a touch of Honey nourishes and moisturizes your face, leaving your skin feel soothed, not dry, after you wash.
Suggested_Use: Moisten face and massage all over, avoiding the delicate eye area. Rinse and pat dry.

Name: Warming Body Balm
Product_desc: A unique blend of organic essential oils gently soothe away stress and fatigue from your overexerted muscles, leaving your body relaxed and comforted. Rosemary warms and soothes sore spots, Lemon Oil invigorates tired skin, and Eucalyptus Leaf Oil soothes and warms your senses. Helps relax and comfort you after exercise or any time.
Suggested_Use: Massage muscles as needed.
